Macromedia Generator 2

13 Sep 1999

Macromedia announced at the end of August the release of Generator 2, their dynamic graphics server for e-commerce and e-business. Get the full story from their press release. I like the little part which reads "The new version of Generator adds streamlined authoring with Flash 4 to make creation of dynamic templates faster and easier".
